descript.abstract: U.S. National Transportation Atlas Railroads represents a comprehensive database of the nation's railway system at 1:100,000 scale. The dataset covers the 48 contiguous States plus the District of Columbia within the United States.
descript.purpose: U.S. National Transportation Atlas Railroads provides location and attribute information for use in national and regional network analysis applications.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States– Direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local Esri Regional Office. For support, contact Esri by telephone (voice) between 5:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing +1-888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at +1-909-792-0960; or visit https://support.esri.com/; Esri holidays excluded. Email and chat are available through the Support page on My Esri (https://my.esri.com).
Outside the United States– Direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local Esri Office. This information can be found at https://www.esri.com/en-us/contact#c=us&t=0. For other questions or comments, you may contact Esri headquarters by email, telephone, or fax or write to us.

dataqual.logic: The dataset is converted to file geodatabase (FGDB) format using tools in ArcGIS. The geometry is checked, and if needed repaired. The network is not topologically connected.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the dataset is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy can be stated as being that associated with a 1;100,000 scale map.

citeinfo.title: National Rail Network 1:100,000 (line)
citeinfo.othercit: From the National Transportation Atlas Databases (NTAD) 2002 CD–ROM.

procstep.procdesc: This geospatial data layer was compiled and reviewed by BTS in April 2002.

The following steps were performed by Esri: Extracted dataset from National Transportation Atlas Databases (NTAD) 2002. Removed "Abandoned" features. Removed unneeded attributes. Coded four features, missing FRA_REG attribute values, based on surrounding features. Clarified values for the MILITARY attribute. Renamed and rearranged attributes. Created ArcGIS® layer file (.lyr), projection file (.prj), and spatial indices. Converted the dataset to SDC.
The following steps were performed by Esri: Added MILES attribute and calculated its values.
Converted the dataset into a file geodatabase.
The following steps were performed by Esri: Removed a small number of railroads in Plumas County, California that no longer exist.

enttyp.enttypd: The lines represent a comprehensive database of the nation's railway system at 1:100,000 scale. The dataset covers the 48 contiguous States plus the District of Columbia within the United States.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The unique sequential identification number for the railroad feature in the network structure.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential whole numbers for the features.

attr.attrdef: The name or identification for the railroad feature.

codesetd.codesetn: Official List of Federal Railroad Administration (FRA) Railroad Names

attr.attrdef: The reporting mark of the first owning railroad feature. A mark of 'XXXX' indicates an abandoned railroad feature. Rule 260 codes are used where available. A mark of 'DUMX' indicates an added connecting railroad feature.

codesetd.codesetn: Federal Railroad Administration (FRA) Rule 260 and Owner Codes

attr.attrdef: Reporting mark of the first railroad feature having trackage-rights.

codesetd.codesetn: Federal Railroad Administration (FRA) List of Railroad Name Abbreviations

attr.attrdef: The type of passenger railroad feature indicator.

edom.edomvd: Rail line now used for rapid transit.

attr.attrdef: The type of military interest railroad feature indicator - this code should match the publication 'Civil Rail Lines Important to National Defense, December 1998'.

edom.edomvd: A connector to the Strategic Rail Corridor Network (STRACNET) system.
On the Strategic Rail Corridor Network (STRACNET) system.

attr.attrdef: The Federal Railroad Administration (FRA) region number for the railroad feature.

codesetd.codesetn: Official List of Federal Railroad Administration (FRA) Region Numbers

attr.attrdef: The measure of distance in miles.
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

digtinfo.formcont: To use this data requires software that works with FGDB files.

stdorder.ordering: Data and Maps is available only as part of ArcGIS® software.
